roleset.name: grow in a peduncle or stalk
roleset.note: PEDUNCULATE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from pedunculate.01-v)

roles.note: This is really an adjective. (from pedunculate.01-v)

example.name: only arg (remember VBN annoation is different!)
